content: this is a light and airy women s crochet sweater pattern perfect for spring/summer season it has lacy panels at the top of front and back panel that add a lovely feminine touch it has been designed as a size inclusive crochet pattern in sizes xs-5xl the pattern also includes six adjustments notes to further customise the size and fit of the sweater sizes chest circumference xs 80cm s 90cm m 100cm l 110cm xl 123cm 2xl 133cm 3xl 143cm 4xl 153cm 5xl 162cm the gauge has been measured over half_double_crochet worked through back loop only in round you will need wecrochet hawthorne speckle hand painted fingering weight 357 yards/327m per 100g ball 80% superwash fine highland wool 20% polyamide x 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 8 skeins in spark 28618 the pattern is also free on my blog
